content: work pattern row 1 again to complete diamond section * note that the 3rd time working pattern row 3 is a buttonhole row row 1 k15 *p1 k7 repeat from * until 16 sts remain p1 k15 row 2 and 8 k9 p5 *k1 p1 k1 p5 repeat from * until 17 sts remain k1 p1 k1 p5 k9 row 3 and 7 k9 *p1 k3 repeat from * until 10 sts remain p1 k9 row 4 and 6 k9 p1 *k1 p1 k1 p5 repeat from * until 13 sts remain k1 p1 k1 p1 k9 row 5 k11 *p1 k7 repeat from * until 12 sts remain p1 k11 when diamond section is complete work 1 final row in curry you will have worked a total of 28 row in curry ending on a ws row begin working in burgundy work 2 row begin working in yellow work 6 row begin working in white work 2 row bottom ribbing change needles to 2 5mm and begin working in purple work 8 row with 1x1 ribbing as follows * note that 5th row in purple is a buttonhole row rs k10 *p1 k1 repeat from * until 9 sts remain k9 ws k9 *p1 k1 repeat from * until 10 sts remain p1 k9 row 5 buttonhole row girl k10 *p1 k1 repeat from * until 9 sts remain k2 make buttonhole k to end of row boy k4 make buttonhole k2 *p1 k1 repeat from *until 9 sts remain k9 ©vraja leader - @tiemeinknits diamonds for baby cardigan page 6 of 9 begin working in curry work 1 row in curry k10 *p1 k1 repeat from * until 9 sts remain k9 cast off on ws in a stretchy bind off sleeves sleeves are knit in the round and shaped by decreasing stitches at intervals the 1st round begins in the centre of the 4 underarm stitches that were cast on when sleeves and body were separated in the 1st round extra stitches are picked up between the underarm and the sleeve to minimise the appearance of a hole which can occur at this point in the 2nd round these extra stitches are knitted together to close the gaps using white yarn and 3mm needles for working in the round begin the sleeve as follows 1st round begin in the centre of the 4 cast on underarm stitches pick up and knit 2 underarm sts pick up and knit 2 extra sts between the underarm sts and sleeve sts on the holder k sleeve sts from holder transfer sts to needle first if needed pick up and knit 2 sts between sleeve sts and underarm sts pick up and knit final 2 underarm sts to complete round pm to mark beginning of round 2nd round k1 k2tog k2tog k until 5 sts remain k2tog k2tog k1 49 sts k all following sleeve rounds with the exception of rounds with decreases and the curry diamond section work 4 more
